p: DSC thermograms of raw loratadine, sulpiride and their 1:1 physical mixture are revealed Figure 2. Loratadine exhibited a sharp endotherm at 135 °C ascribed to its melting temperature Akhgari et al., 2016 (Akhgari et al., 2016). Thermogram of sulpiride displayed a sharp endotherm at a temperature of 175 °C attributed to its melting transition (Zidan et al., 2015). The physical mixture DSC thermogram presented the melting endothermic peak of loratadine at 135 °C while showed the absence of the melting endotherm of sulpiride.
